name: Chaos Dungeon (Vincentius Arianto)
description:
A randomized chaotic dungeon crawler arcade game made for BGDJam in 72 hours with the theme "Choose a path".

In this game you must explore a randomized dungeon to find stairs to reach the next floor while dealing with random modifiers. along the way you will face many enemies, break many crates, and drink potions. try your best to reach high floor, collect many gold, and beat many enemies.

Controls:

WASDMovementLeft clickAttack/Click menuRReloadEProceed to next floorEscPause game

recommended aspect ratio 16:9

Credits:

Made by Vincentius Arianto
